markdownRemark.html:
The DisputeLab Dashboard provides a summary of key information, including case activity, user activity, pending ERT notifications, case status overview and trending reason codes.

Case Activity

The Case Activity graph is an at-a-glance display of cases completed, expired, rejected or open according to a user-defined time period.

User Activity

Case work statistics are listed under User Activity. Data being tracked include cases per hour (CPH), average case time (ACT), as well as assigned, rejected and completed cases. Users actively working are also displayed.

Pending ERT Notifications

Pending ERT notifications by ERT creation date are displayed on the Dashboard. This overview represents ERTs created for the prior 7 days.

Case Status Overview

The number of unassigned cases, assigned cases, cases worked and cases in review over the past 30 days are shown in the Case Status Overview section.

Visa and Mastercard Reason Codes

The top 5 Visa and Mastercard reason codes according to case received date for the past 30 days are displayed as colour-coded charts.

Data can be hidden from the chart by selecting the corresponding reason code.
